description: This file defines a reusable Flutter widget 'NameCard' which displays information about a baby name, including gender, meaning, rashi, language, and a favorite toggle button. It uses Provider for state management related to favorites.

classes.name: NameCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a card showing baby name details with favorite functionality.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NameCard, displaying baby name details and favorite button.
